title: Sun-dried tomato and pesto pasta
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons dried basil', '1 tablespoon pine nuts, crushed', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '85g sun-dried tomatoes', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '225g fresh mushrooms, sliced', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '450g pasta']
